name: Kodumaro Tetris
description:
My personal implementation of Tetris. You need TIC-80 in order to play or edit the game.

  • Joystick horizontal axis (or left/right arrow keys) to move the tetromino
  • Joystick up (or up arrow key) to rotate right
  • Button A (Z key) to pause
  • Button B (X key) to let the tetromino fall
  • Button X (A key) rotates left
  • Button Y (S key) rotates right
